entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kaladar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
